Class ChartsProperties

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.spring.autoconfigure.ChartsProperties
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix="arbercharts") public class ChartsProperties extends Object
Configuration properties for ArberCharts.

Bind these properties in your application.yml or application.properties: 

arbercharts:
  theme: dark
  export:
    enabled: true
    formats: [png, svg, pdf]
    directory: /tmp/charts
  performance:
    virtual-threads: true
    max-concurrent-renders: 10
Since:
2.0.0
